thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical jointly plans medical industry buyout fund with partners

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical jointly plans medical industry buyout fund with partners

organizations.name: reuters) - guangdong zhongsheng pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Guangdong Zhongsheng Pharmaceutical Co Ltd :
* Says it jointly plans medical industry buyout fund with partners
* The fund is with a size of up to 500 million yuan and the company will invest up to 80 million yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/1QuSLd
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
